original: Dietmann, Paul Wilhelm, överingenjör, Jönköping, f. 26/2/77 i Burg, Tyskl. G. 36 m. Gisela Adolphi von Arnim. Barn: Wilhelm f. 02, Albert 03, Frieda 05, Irma 09. — Stud. v. Domgymn. i Magdeiburg, Techn. Hochsch.. Tidig. anst. inom tänd-sticksind. i Holl., Belg., Ung., Schweiz. Övering. i Sv. Tändst. A-B i Jönköp. fr. 16. Uttag, ett 30-tal patent på tändsticksmask. m. m. Led. av styr. i Vaxduksiboil., Småil.-Anne berg, o. Mo-torfabr. i Jönköp., hed :ordf. i Radio-kl. RVO, IVAs LagermannGM.
translated: Dietmann, Paul Wilhelm, chief engineer, Jönköping, born on February 26, 1877 in Burg, Germany. Married in 1936 to Gisela Adolphi von Arnim. Children: Wilhelm (born in 1902), Albert (1903), Frieda (1905), Irma (1909). Studied at Domgymnasium in Magdeburg, Technical University. Previously employed in the match industry in Holland, Belgium, Hungary, and Switzerland. Chief engineer at Swedish Match AB in Jönköping from 1916. Obtained approximately 30 patents for matchstick machines, etc. Board member of Vaxduksibolaget, Smålands Anneberg, and Motorfabriken in Jönköping. Honorary chairman of the Radio Club. Awarded RVO and IVAs Lagermann medal.

structured.name: Paul Wilhelm Dietmann
structured.patent: Approximately 30 patents for matchstick machines and related technologies.
